00050 void checked_fclose(FILE *fp, bool yes = true) {
00051   if (yes && fp)
00052     fclose(fp);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void cmd_help(ParserState &state, HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00056   const char **text = HqlHelpText::get(state.str);
00057 
00058   if (text) {
00059     for (; *text; ++text)
00060       cb.on_return(*text);
00061   }
00062   else
00063     cb.on_return("\nno help for '" + state.str);
00064 }

00066 void
00067 cmd_show_create_table(Client *client, ParserState &state,
00068                       HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00069   String out_str;
00070   String schema_str = client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00071   Schema *schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(),
00072                                         schema_str.length(), true);
00073   if (!schema->is_valid())
00074     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00075 
00076   schema->render_hql_create_table(state.table_name, out_str);
00077   cb.on_return(out_str);
00078   cb.on_finish();
00079 }

00081 void
00082 cmd_create_table(Client *client, ParserState &state,
00083                  HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00084   String schema_str;
00085   Schema *schema;
00086 
00087   if (!state.clone_table_name.empty()) {
00088     schema_str = client->get_schema(state.clone_table_name);
00089     schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(), schema_str.size(), true);
00090     schema_str.clear();
00091     schema->render(schema_str);
00092     client->create_table(state.table_name, schema_str.c_str());
00093   }
00094   else {
00095     schema = new Schema();
00096     schema->set_compressor(state.table_compressor);
00097 
00098     foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *ag, state.ag_list)
00099       schema->add_access_group(ag);
00100 
00101     if (state.ag_map.find("default") == state.ag_map.end()) {
00102       Schema::AccessGroup *ag = new Schema::AccessGroup();
00103       ag->name = "default";
00104       schema->add_access_group(ag);
00105     }
00106     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *cf, state.cf_list) {
00107       if (cf->ag == "")
00108         cf->ag = "default";
00109       schema->add_column_family(cf);
00110     }
00111     const char *error_str = schema->get_error_string();
00112 
00113     if (error_str)
00114       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, error_str);
00115 
00116     schema->render(schema_str);
00117     client->create_table(state.table_name, schema_str.c_str());
00118   }
00119   cb.on_finish();
00120 }

00125   String schema_str = client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00126   cb.on_return(schema_str);
00127   cb.on_finish();

00130 void
00131 cmd_select(Client *client, ParserState &state, HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00132   TablePtr table = client->open_table(state.table_name);
00133   TableScannerPtr scanner = table->create_scanner(state.scan.builder.get());
00134   FILE *outfp = cb.output;
00135 
00136   // whether it's select into file
00137   if (!state.scan.outfile.empty()) {
00138     FileUtils::expand_tilde(state.scan.outfile);
00139     if ((outfp = fopen(state.scan.outfile.c_str(), "w")) == 0)
00140       HT_THROWF(Error::EXTERNAL, "Unable to open file '%s' for writing - %s",
00141                 state.scan.outfile.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00142     if (state.scan.display_timestamps) {
00143       if (state.scan.keys_only)
00144         fprintf(outfp, "#timestamp\trowkey\n");
00145       else
00146         fprintf(outfp, "#timestamp\trowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00147     }
00148     else {
00149       if (state.scan.keys_only)
00150         fprintf(outfp, "#rowkey\n");
00151       else
00152         fprintf(outfp, "#rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00153     }
00154   }
00155   else if (!outfp) {
00156     cb.on_scan(*scanner.get());
00157     return;
00158   }
00159 
00160   HT_ON_SCOPE_EXIT(&checked_fclose, outfp, outfp != cb.output);
00161 
00162   Cell cell;
00163   uint32_t nsec;
00164   time_t unix_time;
00165   struct tm tms;
00166 
00167   while (scanner->next(cell)) {
00168     if (cb.normal_mode) {
00169       // do some stats
00170       ++cb.total_cells;
00171       cb.total_keys_size += strlen(cell.row_key);
00172 
00173       if (cell.column_family && cell.column_qualifier)
00174         cb.total_keys_size += strlen(cell.column_qualifier) + 1;
00175 
00176       cb.total_values_size += cell.value_len;
00177     }
00178     if (state.scan.display_timestamps) {
00179       if (cb.format_ts_in_usecs) {
00180         fprintf(outfp, "%llu\t", (Llu)cell.timestamp);
00181       }
00182       else {
00183         nsec = cell.timestamp % 1000000000LL;
00184         unix_time = cell.timestamp / 1000000000LL;
00185         gmtime_r(&unix_time, &tms);
00186         fprintf(outfp, "%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d.%09d\t", tms.tm_year+1900,
00187                 tms.tm_mon+1, tms.tm_mday, tms.tm_hour, tms.tm_min,
00188                 tms.tm_sec, nsec);
00189       }
00190     }
00191     if (!state.scan.keys_only) {
00192       if (cell.column_family) {
00193         fprintf(outfp, "%s\t%s", cell.row_key, cell.column_family);
00194         if (cell.column_qualifier && *cell.column_qualifier)
00195           fprintf(outfp, ":%s", cell.column_qualifier);
00196       }
00197       else
00198         fprintf(outfp, "%s", cell.row_key);
00199 
00200       if (cell.flag != FLAG_INSERT) {
00201         fputc('\t', outfp);
00202         fwrite(cell.value, cell.value_len, 1, outfp);
00203         fputs("\tDELETE\n", outfp);
00204       }
00205       else {
00206         fputc('\t', outfp);
00207         fwrite(cell.value, cell.value_len, 1, outfp);
00208         fputc('\n', outfp);
00209       }
00210     }
00211     else
00212       fprintf(outfp, "%s\n", cell.row_key);
00213   }
00214 
00215   cb.on_finish(0);
00216 }

00218 void
00219 cmd_load_data(Client *client, ParserState &state,
00220               HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00221   TablePtr table;
00222   TableMutatorPtr mutator;
00223   bool into_table = true;
00224   bool display_timestamps = false;
00225   FILE *outfp = cb.output;
00226 
00227   if (state.table_name.empty()) {
00228     if (state.output_file.empty())
00229       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR,
00230                "LOAD DATA INFILE ... INTO FILE - bad filename");
00231     outfp = fopen(state.output_file.c_str(), "w");
00232     into_table = false;
00233   }
00234   else {
00235     table = client->open_table(state.table_name);
00236     mutator = table->create_mutator();
00237   }
00238 
00239   HT_ON_SCOPE_EXIT(&checked_fclose, outfp, outfp != cb.output);
00240 
00241   if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00242     HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, state.input_file);
00243 
00244   cb.file_size = FileUtils::size(state.input_file.c_str());
00245   cb.on_update(cb.file_size);
00246 
00247   LoadDataSource lds(state.input_file, state.header_file, state.key_columns,
00248       state.timestamp_column, state.row_uniquify_chars, state.dupkeycols);
00249 
00250   if (!into_table) {
00251     display_timestamps = lds.has_timestamps();
00252     if (display_timestamps)
00253       fprintf(outfp, "timestamp\trowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00254     else
00255       fprintf(outfp, "rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00256   }
00257 
00258   KeySpec key;
00259   uint8_t *value;
00260   uint32_t value_len;
00261   uint32_t consumed;
00262 
00263   while (lds.next(0, &key, &value, &value_len, &consumed)) {
00264     if (value_len > 0) {
00265       ++cb.total_cells;
00266       cb.total_values_size += value_len;
00267       cb.total_keys_size += key.row_len;
00268 
00269       if (into_table) {
00270         try {
00271           mutator->set(key, value, value_len);
00272         }
00273         catch (Exception &e) {
00274           do {
00275             mutator->show_failed(e);
00276           } while (!mutator->retry());
00277         }
00278       }
00279       else {
00280         if (display_timestamps)
00281           fprintf(outfp, "%llu\t%s\t%s\t%s\n", (Llu)key.timestamp,
00282                   (char *)key.row, key.column_family, (char *)value);
00283         else
00284           fprintf(outfp, "%s\t%s\t%s\n", (char *)key.row,
00285                   key.column_family, (char *)value);
00286       }
00287     }
00288     if (cb.normal_mode)
00289       cb.on_progress(consumed);
00290   }
00291 
00292   cb.on_finish(mutator.get());
00293 }
00294 
00295 void
00296 cmd_insert(Client *client, ParserState &state, HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00297   TablePtr table = client->open_table(state.table_name);
00298   TableMutatorPtr mutator = table->create_mutator();
00299   const Cells &cells = state.inserts.get();
00300 
00301   try {
00302     mutator->set_cells(cells);
00303   }
00304   catch (Exception &e) {
00305     do {
00306       mutator->show_failed(e);
00307     } while (!mutator->retry());
00308   }
00309   if (cb.normal_mode) {
00310     cb.total_cells = cells.size();
00311 
00312     foreach(const Cell &cell, cells) {
00313       cb.total_keys_size += cell.column_qualifier
00314           ? (strlen(cell.column_qualifier) + 1) : 0;
00315       cb.total_values_size += cell.value_len;
00316     }
00317   }
00318   cb.on_finish(mutator.get());
00319 }
00320 
00321 void
00322 cmd_delete(Client *client, ParserState &state, HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00323   TablePtr table = client->open_table(state.table_name);
00324   TableMutatorPtr mutator = table->create_mutator();
00325 
00326   KeySpec key;
00327   char *column_qualifier;
00328 
00329   key.row = state.delete_row.c_str();
00330   key.row_len = state.delete_row.length();
00331 
00332   if (state.delete_time != 0)
00333     key.timestamp = ++state.delete_time;
00334   else
00335     key.timestamp = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00336 
00337   if (state.delete_all_columns) {
00338     try {
00339       mutator->set_delete(key);
00340     }
00341     catch (Exception &e) {
00342       mutator->show_failed(e);
00343       return;
00344     }
00345   }
00346   else {
00347     foreach(const String &col, state.delete_columns) {
00348       ++cb.total_cells;
00349 
00350       key.column_family = col.c_str();
00351       if ((column_qualifier = strchr(col.c_str(), ':')) != 0) {
00352         *column_qualifier++ = 0;
00353         key.column_qualifier = column_qualifier;
00354         key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(column_qualifier);
00355       }
00356       else {
00357         key.column_qualifier = 0;
00358         key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00359       }
00360       try {
00361         mutator->set_delete(key);
00362       }
00363       catch (Exception &e) {
00364         mutator->show_failed(e);
00365         return;
00366       }
00367     }
00368   }
00369 
00370   cb.on_finish(mutator.get());
00371 }

00373 void
00374 cmd_show_tables(Client *client, ParserState &state,
00375                 HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00376   std::vector<String> tables;
00377   client->get_tables(tables);
00378   foreach (const String &t, tables) {
00379     cb.on_return(t);
00380   }
00381   cb.on_finish();
00382 }

00386                HqlInterpreter::Callback &cb) {
00387   client->drop_table(state.table_name, state.if_exists);
00388   cb.on_finish();

00399 HqlInterpreter::HqlInterpreter(Client *client)
00400     : m_client(client) {

00403 
00404 void HqlInterpreter::execute(const String &line, Callback &cb) {
00405   ParserState state;
00406   Hql::Parser parser(state);
00407   parse_info<> info = parse(line.c_str(), parser, space_p);
00408 
00409   if (info.full) {
00410     cb.on_parsed(state);
00411 
00412     switch (state.command) {
00413     case COMMAND_SHOW_CREATE_TABLE:
00414       cmd_show_create_table(m_client, state, cb);               break;
00415     case COMMAND_HELP:
00416       cmd_help(state, cb);                                      break;
00417     case COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE:
00418       cmd_create_table(m_client, state, cb);                    break;
00419     case COMMAND_DESCRIBE_TABLE:
00420       cmd_describe_table(m_client, state, cb);                  break;
00421     case COMMAND_SELECT:
00422       cmd_select(m_client, state, cb);                          break;
00423     case COMMAND_LOAD_DATA:
00424       cmd_load_data(m_client, state, cb);                       break;
00425     case COMMAND_INSERT:
00426       cmd_insert(m_client, state, cb);                          break;
00427     case COMMAND_DELETE:
00428       cmd_delete(m_client, state, cb);                          break;
00429     case COMMAND_SHOW_TABLES:
00430       cmd_show_tables(m_client, state, cb);                     break;
00431     case COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00432       cmd_drop_table(m_client, state, cb);                      break;
00433     case COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00434       cmd_shutdown(m_client, cb);                               break;
00435     default:
00436       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, String("unsupported command: ") + line);
00437     }
00438   }
00439   else
00440     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, String("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00441 }
